message.body: *now
Hah. These pictures are PRICELESS
I cheated though, I had a dusty cleft pallette sighting
How long will those remind us of him? Only 1 in 14000 people have it so I guess he was it for 18 of our years
No I mean I actually saw him!
Oh my gawddddd
Where does a clown get some movement clothes in Mankato?
I think there is that yoga store by the coffee shop?
Would they have tights too?
Hmmmm probs not - dance express?
Where's that? In the other mall?
Its actually by that taco johns we ate at with princessd
Oh cool
How was austin? Have u decided on a date you're moving??

Ugh good. So hard to leave. Not a fan of tx though... Too hot. I think the 4th for the move. Not sure when I want you there though. There's a gala where we are the guests if honor that you may be my plus 1 at... I'm rehearsing for this blasted concert tomorrow now...
GOod luck tomorrow!! Don't forget to close the evening by welcoming donations! Just let me know. Glad to hear things went well :)
U should also post videos of u singing on kickstart!!
I tried kickstarter but you have to have a concrete project like a cd or play or something like that. They have an approval process etc etc
Did I tell u that drive is reaallll fucking good?
Drive? The movie?
Yeah!!
With Ryan g and the other girl we like?
Oh gawd girl and have some caffeine too. Haven't jumped that much during a movie ever
Whoa, during the action!
Carrey mulligan. Yep!! And it really resonated because someone who works with me was telling me how he shot someone etc and the movie is really violent
Its kinda pulp fictiony
Umm I'm guessing that's a coworker from pranna
But more. Beautiful and the music is SO perfect. Yeah adrian, who is with me right now! He is so sweet and he started casually telling me about the incident
No worries, he didn't get caught
Ummmm yikes why'd he do it?
Well I didn't get those details but I know he was stabbed 12 times when he was a cab driver and before he even got out of the hospital his family found the two
Guys and shot them
Is he in the mafia or just normalizing violence?
Normalizing violence, kinda what the movie touches on, at least in my head. He is not in a gang or anything like that. Oh and the shooting happened on 101st and
But no worries, I haven't heard any shots :)
What???
Its a perfect neighborhood because it has the grit that makes me hear stories like that but it isn't that bad. Not the bronx
Diversity!
It's such a colorful place. I love it so much I annoy myself.
Also u could put out a list for people to leave their email/mailing address so they can hear about your journey. THEN u can also send them a soft ask letter
Aha! Good idea!
Following the performance. I just did this for this event we had. It might make people feel comfortable giving u extra. "Thank u for coming blah blah I hope u
Can help me on my journey.."
How much are tickets?
And what time?
The concerts at 7 and it's $8
I wish I could come!
Break a leg baby! Wish I could be there
Me tooooooo! Thanks for thinking of me
Hilarious. Also, why would that make me want to buy a storage unit?
They are all over and they developed a reputation for being funny. They used to be like "I've heard there are other borughs. Great" or "if u leave the island yo
You will come back republican" - promoting stirage
Storage in manhattan over the burbs. Now they r just snarky. "If u don't like gay marriage don't get gay married."
I hope their movers are just as funnnnnny. Your parents are so generous, btw. I made $700 last night!
Yes!!! I had this really good idea to help out but I failed myself. Next time u have a fundraiser concert...
Hopefully another one won't be necessary. But I don't know what that could be... An interpretive dance?
Ha! Since I couldn't come I wanted to buy a ticket for someone else so I was going to check in with lucas and ben. Lucas would have LOVED it. "Voice of an angel
Awwwwww cute!
But it totally slipped my mind and then it was too late :(
It's the thought that counts... :)
Oh and I just picked up kundera's Immortality. 2 very different people told me it was their favorite book within12 hours. An editor and a host at pranna.
Crazy! Synchronicity...
Yeah!! It's a sign. I think it seems like a perfect fall book.
Omg I'm watching a show about a psychic in long island and I'm WEEPING
TLC man. Sometimes they get it right
What show is that?? I want it!
"long island medium"
I want to be psychic!
That sounds like a hit!! Talk to mary kay. BUT I think singer/writer is your calling.
Since when??
This right before I go to clown school
I've always thought you should sing or be a writer. Don't u know, he is in LOVE with u???
Hah. We'll see. A PSYCHIC singer and writer
Shirley mcclain did it with acting
U feeling ready for philly??
Mentally yes. Logistically no!! But I moved my move day to the 6th. I needed more time with the concert and all.
Mentally is more important anyways. The logistics will figure themselves out. #fire
I hope so! I'm actually very excited. It's nice to have some down time first though.
Do you work Fridays now?
You know when you get arrested... What do you think you eat? Somebody's got to be in charge of that right?
??? I don't work fridays but katie might be coming to visit this friday
Just for the day or the weekend!
Sorry that was supposed to be a ?
I think she is going to leave on saturday to go to boston
I do have monmday off!
I have school on Monday but do you want to come on saturday and stay the night? You can be my date at the gala....
Ohhhhh, that sounds fun!! Let me confirm with kt/pranna and I will let u know. Life is starting!!
Ugh I knowwwwww!
Is this the first time you're seeing katie since the cabin?
Yeah, and we haven't talked since that one day. She sent me a postcard though. I wanna dance to calvin harris' "feel so close" with u.
How did you plan her visit then? And let me look up that song...
Like a forcefield!
Yes!! She gchatted me on thursday night. Love that song...
I think it's because I know and am very conscious that we're not on good terms but I miss her.
Yeah that makes sense.it's that feeling of change and letting things as we know it come to an end that is hard to grasp
You mean my friendship with Katie coming to an end?
No, but knowing it's not going to be the same for awhile - "things as we know it"
Ah right. Yea. I dont even know if I could tell her that I miss her. It seems like she needs to see things as black and white still
Im so emotional about Amanda Knox being acquitted!
Yeah, I can't wait to watch. News! Good or bad emotional
Good emotional, from what they're saying she is definitely not guilty. Four years in an Italian jail for a crime she didnt commit...
Apparently the prosecuting lawyer had something to prove and it was his last chance to recover his reputation
